job_description: We’re hiring an AI Engineer to build LangGraph-based agentic workflows on Azure. Must have strong Python, RAG (Qdrant or Azure AI Search), prompt engineering, and Streamlit UI. Nice-to-have: LangSmith, Langfuse, and deployment to Azure Container Apps.

questions.text: Can you describe your experience building agentic workflows? What tools and patterns did you use?
questions.guidance: Look for specific patterns (tool-use, planning, reflection) and concrete tools.

questions.text: Tell me about your experience deploying on Azure for GenAI apps.
questions.guidance: Expect infra specifics: ACA/App Service, secrets, scaling, network/security.

questions.text: How have you implemented RAG in production?
questions.guidance: Signal for vector DB, chunking strategy, retrieval, and eval/feedback loops.

questions.text: What’s your approach to building simple UIs for demos or POCs?
questions.guidance: Expect Streamlit details and how they manage state + deploy.
